key.name: startonstart
key.summary: Start Yandex.Disk daemon on indicator start
key.description: Launch Yandex.Disk daemon when indicator Yandex.Disk indicator is starting.

key.name: fmextensions
key.description: Activate file manager extensions for file/folder Internet sharing/unsharing via Yandex.Disk.

key.name: autostartdaemon
key.description: Automatically launch Yandex.Disk daemon at start-up.

key.name: optionreadonly
key.summary: Do not upload locally changed files to Yandex.Disk
key.description: Do not upload locally changed files to Yandex.Disk. Changed files will be renamed.

key.name: optionoverwrite
key.summary: In read-only mode: overwrite locally changed files
key.description: Force the Yandex.Disk to overwrite any locally changed files in read-only mode.

key.name: stoponexit
key.description: Force the Yandex.Disk daemon to stop when the indicator application is closing.

key.name: debug
key.description: Show or Hide all debug messages.
